eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Clackamas; Columbia; Multnomah; Washington, OR; Clark, WA; AT 11:14 AM ON NOV 05, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:14 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a coordinated monthly test of the Emergency Alert System through broadcast stations in the Greater Portland/Vancouver area including Clackamas, Columbia, Multnomah and Washington Counties in Oregon, and Clark County in Washington. With the cooperation of Public Safety, Broadcasters, and Cable operators, this system informs you of events that pose an immediate threat to your life, health, or property. If this had been an actual emergency, official information would have followed the alert tone. This test was originated by Clackamas County in Oregon. This concludes this test message.
